thread.title: Markets live: FTSE bounces back as China injects fresh stimulus after stocks crash in country's 'Black Tuesday'
thread.title_full: Markets live: FTSE bounces back as China injects fresh stimulus after stocks crash in country's 'Black Tuesday'

author: Mehreen Khan
title: Markets live: FTSE bounces back as China injects fresh stimulus after stocks crash in country's 'Black Tuesday'
text: Markets Markets live: FTSE bounces back as China injects fresh stimulus after stocks crash in country's 'Black Tuesday' Beijing slashes its main interest rate by 50 basis points - its fifth cut in nine months - in response to stock market rout Saving the world again? The People's Bank of China has slashed interest rates Photo: Copyright (c) 2015 Rex Features.
